name: py-clean-text

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
User-generated content on the Web and in social media is often dirty.
Preprocess your scraped data with clean-text to create a normalized text
representation.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ftfy
dependencies.description: Fixes Unicode that's broken in various ways.

dependent_to.name: py-convokit
dependent_to.description:
This toolkit contains tools to extract conversational features and
analyze social phenomena in conversations, using a single unified
interface inspired by (and compatible with) scikit-learn.
